channel.title: AkaTsukiBall
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "AkaTsukiBall" - found something

item.title: Re: AkaTsukiBall
item.content:encoded: It's a random chance to level up based on your score. Higher scores have a higher chance, but you could still level up by rolling a 10.

item.title: Re: AkaTsukiBall
item.content:encoded:
Not sure on a max level, but there's a Trophy for level 50, 'Hanging with 11DHK' or something like that. I'm not sure if the Hat item (+5 Tsuki levels) counts toward that though, my highest leveled is 45 without it.

I'm also completely lost on how you 'level up'. Several times I roll and get 200+ and nothing, then I level on a roll then level again one or two rolls later for no obvious reason. *shrugs*

item.title: Re: AkaTsukiBall
item.content:encoded: i also don't know exactly if there a max lvl, but i'm quite sure there isn't something like that

item.title: Re: AkaTsukiBall
item.content:encoded: I don't think there is a max level, but i think it is harder to level up the higher you get. I'm level 50 (+Hat)

item.title: Re: AkaTsukiBall
item.content:encoded:
Does anyone know what the highest level you can get to is in Tsukiball?

PS: I'm level 6 right now.

item.title: Re: AkaTsukiBall
item.content:encoded: Actually, in the party house, it's listed as AkaTsukiBall.

item.title: Re: AkaTsukiBall
item.content:encoded:
I should probably point out that the title for this topic is inaccurate.

It's not 'Tsuki' as in 'Akatsuki' it's 'Tsuki' which is a Japanese word that sounds similar to 'Skee' as in 'SkeeBall' which is what this particular game is typically known as.

item.title: Re: AkaTsukiBall
item.content:encoded:
…What hype? I saw no hype at all in the News Archive. Seriously…the closest it got to "hype" was the Special Mission a while back for S3+ people.

This is the line that was front-paged when it actually came out, according to the News Archive here:

June 11, 2008

New Party House Game for Season 3+ Players!

Also, I don't know about you, but I rather like the prizes you can get from it :P

item.title: Re: AkaTsukiBall
item.content:encoded:
haha, you know prior to finding out i was rather excited for the new party house game.

this doesnt really live up to the hype it was given on the front page

item.title: Re: AkaTsukiBall
item.content:encoded:
Are you sure about it being related to score? I'm still keen on thinking it's just a chance thing.

@mynykr - It's a Season 3+ game in the Party House. ( Edit: Ninja'd by Uzuki on this part :P )

item.title: Re: AkaTsukiBall
item.content:encoded: where do you play this game o_O?

item.title: Re: AkaTsukiBall
item.content:encoded:
its to do with your total score, i think it's something like one level per 100 after the first 100

so 200 will be level 1, 300 level 2 etc.

im level 3 and i've only got 60 tickets.

so if you keep getting 190 then you won't go up in levels but you will still get 4 tickets for example.

item.title: Re: AkaTsukiBall
item.content:encoded: No, I'm pretty sure that part has been there since the beginning. What makes you think it was changed? *hopes it wasn't something he had said in the last post…*

item.title: Re: AkaTsukiBall
item.content:encoded:
"As you play, you'll get better and better, which increases your chances of rolling the highest value in the area you select"

they must have changed the discription

item.title: Re: AkaTsukiBall
item.content:encoded:
It's not new info, it just didn't get much lovin' here due to being S3+ only and not getting a major front page announcement. Not much attention got drawn to it.

It's just a chance thingas far as I know. Did you try reading the description of the game on BvS, and maybe it's mentioned there? I'm pretty sure the description says that with a higher Tsuki level you have a better chance for higher rolls, though I can't say from experience.

item.title: Re: AkaTsukiBall
item.content:encoded:
and again

Tsuki Level Up!
You are now Level 2
Tickets Given: 7
(Total Tickets: 103)

maybe every 50?

item.title: AkaTsukiBall
item.content:encoded:
im not sure if this is new info because we dont have a page on this game but, when playing it the comment came up:

Tsuki Level Up!
You are now Level 1

if more info is wanted then:

"Ball #9: 50!
Game Over!

Total Rolls:
10, 10, 40, 10, 50, 10, 10, 50, 50
Total Score: 240

Tsuki Level Up!
You are now Level 1
Tickets Given: 7
(Total Tickets: 49)

Current Ryo: 10243
Total Spent: 9000"
